game.name: Hitler is My Crush: Love and Fascism
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hitler is My Crush: Love and Fascism is a crazy love story that defies logic, common sense and everything you knew about the world. You play as a girl madly in love with... Hitler.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hitler is My Crush: Love and Fascism is a crazy love story that defies logic, common sense and everything you knew about the world. You play as a girl madly in love with... Hitler.
